mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANY ( company_num, company_id, business_number, company_password, company_name, company_phone, company_email, drown_company, company_create_at, company_image, company_banner ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMPANY.NEXTVAL, #{companyEmail}, #{businessNumber}, #{companyPassword}, #{companyName}, #{companyPhone}, #{companyEmail}, 'N', SYSDATE, NULL, NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT company_num AS companyNum, company_id AS companyId, business_number AS businessNumber, company_password AS companyPassword, company_name AS companyName, company_phone AS companyPhone, company_email AS companyEmail, drown_company AS drownCompany, company_create_at AS companyCreateAt FROM COMPANY WHERE company_email = #{email}
